title: Pokemon Scarlet Violet: Get Mew & Mewtwo!!

alternative_titles.en: Pokemon Scarlet and Pokemon Violet: Get Mew and Mewtwo!
alternative_titles.ja: 『ポケットモンスター スカーレット・バイオレット』「Get Mew & Mewtwo !!」

synopsis: A promotional video for the Get Mew & Mewtwo!! event in Pokemon Scarlet Violet. For a limited time, you could redeem a Mystery Gift to get Mew, a Pokemon which can not be encountered normally in the game. You could then battle Mew against Mewtwo in a Tera Raid Battle for the opportunity to get Mewtwo.
